name: TextAbout
description: Centered about section with large animated text and optional buttons below.

title.example: We build products that empower teams to create exceptional digital experiences

buttonRules.note: Button variant controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant. Border radius controlled by ThemeProvider's borderRadius. All sections should be wrapped in a single ThemeProvider at the app/page level.

propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{ text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string, props?: Partial<ButtonPropsForVariant<CTAButtonVariant>> }>

usageExample:
// Wrap in ThemeProvider
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" defaultTextAnimation="reveal-blur" borderRadius="soft" background="aurora" cardStyle="glass-elevated" primaryButtonStyle="gradient" secondaryButtonStyle="glass">
  <TextAbout title="We create exceptional digital experiences" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} buttons={[{ text: 'Get Started', href: 'https://example.com' }, { text: 'Learn More', href: 'about' }]} />
</ThemeProvider>
